entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 8:49 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
